channel.title: Justin Bieber Arrested
channel.description:
Well no one's really brought this up, so yeah. Sorry about me posting a bit late :o AND NO I DON'T LIKE HIM... [b]Justin bieber got arrested last week for DUI and Drag racing.[/b] There's this petition deport him to Canada aswell: https://petitions.whitehouse.gov/petition/deport-justin-bieber-and-revoke-his-green-card/ST1yqHJL
Here's his court video: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uZf13KZhNQc[/youtube]
Views on this?

item.title: Justin Bieber Arrested
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

amy_webb:

It isn’t that you shouldn’t judge him, it is that you shouldn’t judge him so harshly when everyone else acts the same or worse then he does.

Don’t think anyone knows if someone has done worse at this point of time because he’s media’s main point for attraction. Not to mention he did what he did with the racing and stuff, but it’s whatever - could care less if he’s deported or not, I simply don’t feel like hearing about it every time though… -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Justin Bieber Arrested
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:41, topic:539481”]It isn’t that you shouldn’t judge him, it is that you shouldn’t judge him so harshly when everyone else acts the same or worse then he does.[/quote]Everyone doesn’t spit on people that like them. And believe me, I could care less about the man, but when one spits on their fans, I tend to lose all respect for that person.

Read full topic

item.title: Justin Bieber Arrested
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:39, topic:539481”]He is a teenager, what do you expect? This whole indecent is old now but what people need to understand is they do things exactly the same as he would and not receive this much hate. You might get grounded by your mother or lose your phone but not this, isn’t your late teens and your 20s about stuffing around? I don’t like Justin Bieber as a person or for his music but i don’t think he should be judged by his actions when they reflect what a lot of other youth are doing and have been doing since before he was discovered.

It also seems pointless to revoke his green card when a majority of American artists acts in the same manner, aren’t they also influencing youth like he is? It seems as though Americans are full of spite toward successful artists let alone Canadian ones, calm down and ignore what these people do because you can’t change it.[/quote]
wow that was deep amy

Read full topic

item.title: Justin Bieber Arrested
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:26, topic:539481”]Why the circlejerk? Justin Bieber is a capable man who has proven himself by amassing the massive fortune he is the owner of today. We promote a hate-free community. I hope he is released soon. We need more good role model superstars who can reach today’s youth to raise standards.

THANK YOU JB.[/quote]Great role models spit on their fans.

[quote=“amy_webb, post:39, topic:539481”]He is a teenager, what do you expect? This whole indecent is old now but what people need to understand is they do things exactly the same as he would and not receive this much hate. You might get grounded by your mother or lose your phone but not this, isn’t your late teens and your 20s about stuffing around? I don’t like Justin Bieber as a person or for his music but i don’t think he should be judged by his actions when they reflect what a lot of other youth are doing and have been doing since before he was discovered.

It also seems pointless to revoke his green card when a majority of American artists acts in the same manner, aren’t they also influencing youth like he is? It seems as though Americans are full of spite toward successful artists let alone Canadian ones, calm down and ignore what these people do because you can’t change it.[/quote]If we can’t judge him by his actions, what should we judge him by?

Read full topic
